tables.table_schema: Researchers: (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(50), affiliation VARCHAR(100))
HealthcareData: (record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, diagnosis VARCHAR(100), treatment VARCHAR(100), outcome VARCHAR(50))
Trends: (trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY, trend_name VARCHAR(50), research_area VARCHAR(100), researcher_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(id))
DiseasePatterns: (pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY, disease_name VARCHAR(50), pattern_description TEXT, trend_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (trend_id) REFERENCES Trends(trend_id))
